en: Deal {damage} to he front cell, action first

zh: 對面前一格造成{damage}並擊退
en: Deal {damage} to target in the front cell and repel

zh: 把面前一格目標丟到身后並造成{damage}\n身後沒有空地时失效
en: Throws the person in front of you to the back and deal {damage} \nInvalid if there is no empty cell behind you

zh: 對面前第一個目標造成{damage}
en: Deal {damage} to the first target ahead

zh: 在面前放置一個陷阱，對進入的人造成{damage}
en: Place a trap in the cell ahead. Trap deals {damage} to anyone who enters

zh: 對面前兩目標造成{damage}，需要填充1次
en: Deal {damage} to the first two targets ahead. Need to be recharged 1 time

zh: 對面前第一個目標造成{damage}，附加沒法移动1回合
en: Deal {damage} to the first target ahead, and makes him unable to move for 1 turn
Deal {damage} to the two cells directly in front
Deal {damage} to the front and back cells

zh: 對面前一格造成{damage}，傷害隨着放置的回合增加
en: Deal {damage} to the front cell, and the damage increases with the round it is placed

zh: 移動到面前最前的空地，對路過的人造成{damage}
en: Move to the frontmost empty cell and deal {damage} to people passing by

zh: 進入免疫傷害狀態直到下一階段\n放置无行動消耗
en: Enters a state of immunity to damage until the next stage\nThere is no turn consumption when placed

zh: 和面前一格的人換位\n放置无行動消耗
en: Change places with the person in front of cell\nThere is no turn consumption when placed

zh: 改變方向\n放置无行動消耗
en: Change direction\nThere is no turn consumption when placed

zh: 衝到最前方\n放置无行動消耗
